verbose_text: The various activities of TNF-alpha are mediated by two structurally distinct receptors with opposing functions, TNFR1 and TNFR2, suggesting that targeting such cytokines may cause unwanted adverse effects linked to the fact that signaling through both receptors is affected.
evidence: TNF-alpha are mediated by two structurally distinct receptors with opposing functions, TNFR1 and TNFR2
